document: @AshleyBastock42 I’m trying to win the DC lottery (and if not, the Boston one when I’m visiting a friend this fall), but any luck I have, you are welcome to. 🙂

@AshleyBastock42 Congratulations on NY! It’s fantastic, of course. My friends keep saying they want to see Hamilton but don’t know how to get tickets, so I keep finding some and going with them. But this year has been insane. NY three times, Vegas once, and 3 coming up in Durham.  Very 🍀 lucky!
RT @BroadwayGirlNYC: ⬇️⬇️⬇️ last call! ⬇️⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/ZeD1esy6Pp
@KerryButlerNyc I read this casting this morning and went straight to the website and bought my ticket! I am super excited about this. You and @RobMcClure together will be magic!

@AshleyBastock42 I agree. I’ll reach double-digit visits by November, but seeing the Philip Tour in Las Vegas felt like seeing an entirely new show. So fresh and energetic, and @NikkyWalks is incredible.

@JosephAMorales @Lin_Manuel Well I’ve seen four of these amazing Hamiltons. And by the time @HamiltonMusical comes to @DPAC, I’ll see Mr. @JosephAMorales at least for a third time (and possibly the fourth and fifth if he’s in every night). Chicago, Las Vegas, and soon, Durham!

@ABrightMonster @BeetlejuiceBway OMIGOD! @ABrightMonster AND @RobMcClure in the same cast? All that energy can’t possibly be contained in one theatre. Getting ready now. Beetlejuice, Beetlejuice, Beetlejuice!

@julie_james I just relistened to your wonderful interview with @craigzadan and @neilmeron. So grateful to have these amazing stories archived on @sxmOnBroadway after the sad news of Mr. Zadan’s passing. My thoughts are with his family, friends, coworkers. What an impactful life.
RT @JeffKasky: Repeat after me:  "There's no such thing as an 'assault rifle.'"  Now keep repeating it and maybe it'll come true.... @famsv…
@BravenakBlog Spent my early evening unfollowing a slew of them.
@mstharrington Silent Sam hauled away in disgrace is pretty good.
@incognitorva @DougHeye Read the origin of the statue, in particular, Carr’s speech at the dedication. What it stood for then and what it stands for now are pretty clear.

@jessicajames @DougHeye When it honors a heritage of white supremacy, yes. As for vandalism, this country’s independence grew in part out of an act of vandalism. A little Tea Party. So it’s a pretty American value on display last night.
@EdcleDonato @DougHeye You apparently long for a return to the good old days of the Klan.
@MiloWear1A @DougHeye 😂🤣😂🤣
RT @jk_rowling: ‘Study hard, Mr President, and I might one day say the same about you.’ https://t.co/Yii3LPPNjG
RT @WRAL: BREAKING NEWS: Silent Sam is down! Protesters have toppled the controversial statue on the campus of the University of North Caro…
@fawfulfan Correct.

@sxmOnBroadway @SIRIUSXM Also, I ❤️ @julie_james Broadway Names interviews and the amahzing @SethRudetsky. I was out of the loop for a few years and @sxmOnBroadway pulled me back in. It’s my Godfather! I appreciate learning more about @DavidYazbek and @MrJasonRBrown to go with my Sondheim and classics.

@sxmOnBroadway @SIRIUSXM @ChristinePedi gets me going in the mornings. @sxmOnBroadway stays on all day at home, and of course, when I drive. It gives me changes of pace to push through my daily five mile walks. Love hearing @RottenBroadway @HamiltonMusical @TheBandsVisit @HelloDollyBway @wecomefromaway
@ilanalevine @DavidKorins Yes! Both very different and both excellent! I confess I could listen to @DavidKorins all day. #KorinsKrush is a thing.

RT @MarkJKremer: What is easier to believe:

1. There is a huge conspiracy to make Donald Trump look like an idiot led by the media, intell…
@christinawilkie Banging my head on the table. Ouch.
@astridvanwieren I just booked tickets to come from NC to @wecomefromaway for the fourth time. Bringing a friend who knows not what she’s in for! #LifeChanging
@BroadwayGirlNYC https://t.co/RcXvCboFYT
@broadwaycom @TheBandsVisit Just booked my seats for my FIFTH visit to the Band, my first to see Mr. Gabay. I’m so excited!
@TheDrDrama @_mandygonzalez @NYMag John Simon was horrible misogynist. Such a irrelevant ass.
@DavidKorins @TheHamilcast Oh, yeah, it was good! Had a listening party at midnight and everyone loved the banter.
@DavidKorins @TheHamilcast I hear there were copious olives involved! 😂

@kevinddaly @HelloDollyBway I live a few hundred miles away, but on every visit to NY over the last couple years, I went to see it. Such a spirit lifter. Now I’ll look forward to @BettyBuckley and the tour.
@tonyposnanski https://t.co/ac2fW2G8o5

@MohamedMOSalih How much I spent as a teacher, not just when things were on sale, and how much our state government is failing to invest in a future. Then I go buy school supplies for my teacher friends even though I’m retired.
@DaddyDaddymac https://t.co/I07YVfUGZb
RT @rmasher2: Republicans are trying to use Nancy Pelosi in 2018 the same way they've used Hillary for decades -- Raise the specter of a 's…
@ColMorrisDavis @RickSantorum @CNNSotu @jaketapper @thepioneerwoman @FoodNetwork Tough choice between those two. I’d head for Netflix and British Bake Off.
@DaddyDaddymac Yes

@RealKateBaldwin @MrDavidGordon I loved you two together. What joy you shared with audiences! I was fortunate to see you three times, and I’m so sad there won’t be Hello, Dolly! for me to revisit on my next trip to NY.

@NikkyWalks Oh god, that’s a fantastic show. I just rewatched it and made my best friends watch it too. Besides Boyd and Raylan, you get Wynn and Mags and Dewey Crowe. Some of the best characters ever written for television. Plus Avon Barksdale makes a guest appearance, sorta.
@ABC @thememoryhole2 Gestapo
@BravenakBlog Oh, and I’ve never had Chick-fil-A. I’m kind of proud of that.
@BravenakBlog I had one once. Cardboard tastes better.
@TheBeatWithAri Disgusting that you gave him this forum. Not watching this. Not watching you again either.
@MalcolmNance Not watching him. It was disgusting that he was given this airtime. I already know what I need to know.
@kimgoodspeed1 @martinboydross @BravenakBlog I’m a southerner (NC), and around here y’all is plural. I’ve never heard it used as a singular. Maybe depends on your region?

@WSPate @newsobserver @HamiltonMusical I drove past it just to see the fun, but didn’t get tickets today. I was able to score some last week as a season ticket holder though! I’m coming up on Hamiltons 8-11 before the end of the year, and Band’s Visit #5. #Obsessed
@Impolitics https://t.co/Vmd9nNGxZp
@DaddyDaddymac Beelzebub
@worldaccordinto College production of South Pacific. First Broadway show was the original Annie.
@DavidKorins @BeetlejuiceBway @ABrightMonster @KerryButlerNyc @SOPHIANNECARUSO I’ll find out this Halloween. Can’t wait!
@jbf1755 By color. Yellow is next to go. https://t.co/wlAILEwBX8

@WallaceSmith007 @TheHamilcast I appreciate the respect you paid to @joshuahenry20. He is a light! 

Also can’t wait to see you onstage next week!
@jamesmiglehart @QueenLesli @54Below Please yes! https://t.co/7q4SeNUBF4
@LawyerRogelio @BettyBowers https://t.co/bCSpCyylOF
@julie_james @realleadelaria @sxmOnBroadway @mcctheater @OITNB What a voice she has! I was blown away.

@julie_james How did you manage to interview @robbiefairchild and not simply melt away? I just saw @AmericanInParis and found my new Broadway crush. ❤️ 😊 (Oh, and the rest of the show was magic too!) Loved it and your interview.
@ChristinePedi @sxmOnBroadway Thanks for mentioning upcoming @54Below show with @TonyYazbeck and @LauraOsnes. I realized it falls when I’m visiting! Just got my ticket. Very excited!
@BroadwayGirlNYC Nah. It gets old fast. And the summer heat/humidity is unbearable.
@KwikWarren @DayQuint Yes.
@joshtpm Reminds me of Phineas Gage. Hope the outcome is better.

@tylermckenzie I’ll bake cookies for you when y’all get to Durham. 🙂(Previously delivered homemade peanut brittle to cast in Las Vegas. I’m toying with new flavors getting ready for November.) I ❤️ the Philip tour!
@JaegerKev @TootsieMusical I can’t wait. So tempted to fly to Chicago.
@ginger__who @adamguettel Thank you for posting that.
@EdWhelanEPPC Weasel. He should sue you for every penny. And please, disassociate yourself with any job title that includes the word “ethics.” https://t.co/XJTyyIY2Ob
@DaddyDaddymac I’m not nervous for myself, but if others are involved, I’d have to think hard before calling.
@NikkyWalks @jamesmiglehart Hilarious and so wrong! This is no way to return from vacation!
@MohamedMOSalih Soda

We request that you withdraw your nomination. Whether it's the stolen emails, hidden documents, your per…

@DPAC @HamiltonMusical 2/2 Smith Center rescinded many initial purchases after bots were found. It doesn’t sound like TM cares to stop scalping. So I’m curious what, if anything, was done in Durham after tickets were sold? I’m a season ticket holder, so not personally impacted, but something’s wrong.

@DPAC @HamiltonMusical 1/2 I know about Verified Fan. These investigators found links between Ticketmaster and scalpers and TM gets a cut. Scalpers have hundreds of TM accounts and software to scoop up tics. I tried to help my friends find Hamilton tics here. $600 for rear balcony on Ticketmaster.
@DPAC Is this a part of why @HamiltonMusical tickets were so difficult and why resale tickets were posted well ahead of sales? What have you done to combat bots and scalping? https://t.co/9dePk5JXGl
We went undercover as ticket scalpers — and Ticketmaster offered to help us do business https://t.co/hkdogerJEo via @torontostar
@DaddyDaddymac No. Non. Nein. Nyet. Never. No. Hell no.
@jamesmiglehart @JMunozActor You are the funniest! Looking forward to seeing you again in @HamiltonMusical AND in Little Shop this fall!
@fergsters95 I even want the conductor and band members to sign! I just don’t understand the rudeness.
@AudraEqualityMc @TheBandsVisit It’s perfection.
@peanutpollino What? That’s crazy! Disgusting! I am madly in love with ensemble members. And cannot understand any fool who feels otherwise. 😍
@StopJamminMe @melsil Zero following. Zero followers. Joined this September. Yeah, I’ll listen to this bot troll opinion.
@ilanalevine Totally agree. 😢
@JudyKuhn1 But only six? Why? 🌻😢
@joshua_sandlin We’re not pissed off. We’re laughing at you. 🤣😂
@BroadwayWorld Only six? Why???
@FOX4 This is not a story. This is propaganda to help a murderer avoid charges. What was in HER apartment?
@Lin_Manuel @leslieodomjr @JasonDanieley I’m crying all over again. She was the best. They were the best.

@ilanalevine @JennColella @wecomefromaway When I heard your interview, I knew exactly who she was. The first time I ever rushed a show, it was @wecomefromaway and she was first in line. (I was second). She might as well be in it!
@FOX4 Go to hell. This is character assassination. She was in the wrong. Don't try to justify it. You are despicable.
@anotherredrebel @_SJPeace_ The Twits. Great reference.

@harjo111 @IrlymDiWerNobio @realDonaldTrump Are you two? That’s the only way this could be true.
@PaganChild Let me know if y’all need anything or want a place to hunker down. Kitties are always welcome too.

@DaddyDaddymac It will be somewhat better, but Governor Cooper is a Democrat, so the photo ops won’t be good enough. Congress has still not approved promised funds from the last horrific floods in eastern NC.
@BravenakBlog Yes, though I haven’t had one in years.
@DaddyDaddymac @realDonaldTrump Bo!
@BravenakBlog Absolutely! She’s top of my list!
@julie_james I loved Broadway Names today with the brilliant @spencerliff. So much positivity. Appreciate the comments at the end about the effects of snark.
@BravenakBlog Well said.

@divarobbie @Nike @Kaepernick7 Didn’t need shoes, so I bought workout clothes. #JustDoIt helps me stay fired up for my post-election-depression workouts, and I won’t let the bastards beat me down anymore.
